name: LinkedIn Growth Playbook
description: A step-by-step guide on how to grow an audience and have a successful content strategy on LinkedIn, based on the experiences of B2B SaaS brands like Gong, Clari, and Lavender.
user_context:
this is a google doc with the best practice for growing
  an audience and having a successful content strategy on linkedin
steps: Attract audience with organic-first strategy (supported by selective paid boosts)
Focus on valuable and relatable content that teaches or entertains
Employee activation is key to community-building and engagement
